com.currencycloud.coolpay.utils

Class JsfUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.currencycloud.coolpay.utils.JsfUtils

  • public class JsfUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an static utility class made in order to carry on some common activities such as navigation, session variables and also messages to the user.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tranquilo Dognini Neto

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String SESSION_TOKEN
      Constant which represent the content of the "token" which is used to verify whether the user is authenticated on the system.

      JsfUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • pageRedirect

        public static void pageRedirect(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent evt)
        This is a method which proceed the page redirection. the managed bean receives the parameter containing the addressed page, and redirects to the referred page.
        Parameters:
        evt - Expects the event triggered on the user interface.

      • getSessionToken

        public static java.lang.String getSessionToken()
        This method provides an interface to return the token whith is stored as a session variable.
        Returns:
        String

      • setSessionToken

        public static void setSessionToken(java.lang.String token)
        This method provides an interface to store the token variable on the session variables.
        Parameters:
        token - Expects the token which is the authentication result.

      • clearSession

        public static void clearSession()
        This method is used on the logout method in order to clear all the session variables and invalidate the session.

      • redirect

        public static void redirect(java.lang.String pageRedirect)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        This is an auxiliary method to perform the page redirection.
        Parameters:
        pageRedirect - Expects the page which will the system be redirected to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - This exception happens when the informed page doesn't exists.

      • addMessageInfo

        public static void addMessageInfo(java.lang.String summary,
                                  java.lang.String message)
        This method is used to send a message to the user interface.
        Parameters:
        summary - Expects the title of the message.
        message - Expects the message itself.

      • addMessageError

        public static void addMessageError(java.lang.String summary,

        This method is used to send an error message to the user interface.
        Parameters:
        summary - Expects the title of the message.
        message - Expects the message itself.
